about_the_game:
Adds 2 new Magnusball co-captains.

Requires a fresh playthrough.

For generations - okay, one semester - legendary Magnusball player has been on the side-lines, suffering from an injury that has hurt him both mentally as well as physically. But now he's back! You can utilize his skills in your Magnusball games!

Adds new story content as well.
